product_name: Mountain House Just In Case Classic Assorted Freeze-Dried Food Bucket
long_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Classic Assorted Freeze-Dried Food Bucket makes it easy to keep a total of 29 servings' worth of food on hand for emergencies or camping. Perfect for emergency preparedness, camping, backpacking or at-home use, the easy-to-store, clear bucket lets you easily see the contents. Includes 5 servings each of beef stroganoff with noodles, chicken teriyaki with rice, beef stew, lasagna with meat sauce and noodles & chicken. Also includes 4 servings of granola with milk & blueberries. Meals are easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. The Mountain House Just In Case Classic Assorted Freeze-Dried Food Bucket requires a total of 21 cups of water (not included) to make all the meals. Nutrition facts and specs are based on a serving of beef stroganoff. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Classic Assorted Freeze-Dried Food Bucket makes it easy to keep a total of 29 servings' worth of food on hand for emergencies or camping.
